question: In which {location} was the {method} {col} the {stats} during March 31 {year} ?
code:
def true_code():
    import numpy as np
    import pandas as pd
    main_data = pd.read_csv("raw_data/main_data.csv")
    main_data['Timestamp'] = pd.to_datetime(main_data['Timestamp'])
    data = main_data[(main_data["Timestamp"].dt.month.isin([10, 11, 12, 1, 2, 3])) & (main_data["Timestamp"].dt.year == {code_year})]
    data = data.groupby("{code_location}")["{code_col}"].{code_method}.reset_index()
    data = data.dropna(subset=["{code_col}"])
    data = data.sort_values(by=["{code_col}"])
    print(data.iloc[{code_stats}]["{code_location}"])


true_code()
